CustomField.description: This formula field checks whether the Close KPI has been missed based on the age of the record
CustomField.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Completed')), NOT( Case_First_Closure_Completed__c ), TODAY()- DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > IF( Account.Group_Key__c == $CustomMetadata.Name_Value_Pair__mdt.Henkel_Group_Key.Value__c , VALUE($CustomMetadata.Name_Value_Pair__mdt.Henkel_Case_Close_KPI_Days.Value__c), VALUE($CustomMetadata.Name_Value_Pair__mdt.Case_Close_KPI_Days.Value__c)))
CustomField.label: Close KPI Missed
